characterabilities.name: Alpha Hunter
characterabilities.description: Warbeasts in this model's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range can run, charge, or make power attacks without being forced. When this model destroys one or more enemy modes during its activation, warbeasts in its battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2 SPD and MAT for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [5"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 5", then it's activation ends.

feat.name: Metamorphose
feat.description: Models in Absylonia's battlegroup currently in her Control range gain +2 STR and Flight and their melee weapons become RNG 2. Metamorphose lasts for one round.

execution.name: Field Marshal [Killing Spree]
execution.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Killing Spree.

ability.name: Energy Siphon
ability.description: When this attack hits an enemy model with 1 or more focus, fury, or essence points on it, that model loses 1 focus, fury or essence point and this model gains 1 focus or fury point.

spells.name: Bracer
spells.description: Target warbeast in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 ARM. The affected model and any friendly models B2B with it cannot become knocked down, cannot become knocked down, cannot be pushed, and cannot be moved by a slam.

spells.name: Hex Bolt
spells.description: Models hit by Hex Bolt cannot make special actions, special attacks, or power attacks for one round.

spells.name: Psycho Surgery
spells.description: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range can immediately remove d3+1 damage points. This spell can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Return Fire
spells.description: When target friendly Faction model is targeted by an enemy ranged attack, after the attack is resolved the affected model can make one basic melee or ranged attack, then Return fire expires. Return Fire lasts for one Round.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Forsaken] [Ashen Veil]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Forsaken models gain Ashen Veil.

characterabilities.name: Resourceful
characterabilities.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

feat.name: Panacea
feat.description: Remove all damage from models in Absylonia's battlegroup that are currently in her Control range. Additionally, while in Absylonia's Control range models in her battlegroup gain Rapid Healing, Panacea lasts for one round.

execution.name: Swarm Tactics
execution.description: Lesser Warbeasts in Absylonia's battlegroup gain Advance Deploy.

topability.name: Spontaneous Mutation
topability.description: This model can suffer damage at any time during it's activation to gain one of the following special rules for each damage point suffered. This damage cannot be transferred. Each special rule lasts until the start of this model's next activation.

subabilities.name: Ashen Veil
subabilities.description: This model has concealment. Living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffer -2 to attack accuracy rolls while within 2" of this model.

subabilities.name: Barbed Hooks
subabilities.description: This model's melee weapons become RNG 2, and gain Pull.

subabilities.name: Warp Strength
subabilities.description: This model gains +2 STR.

subabilities.name: Wings
subabilities.description: This model gains +1 SPD and Flight.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

ability.name: Spirit Eater
ability.description: This model can reave fury from enemy warbeasts destroyed by this weapon. Other models cannot reave fury from enemy warbeasts destroyed by this weapon.

spells.name: Blight Burst
spells.description: The AOE remains in play for one round. While in the AOE, enemy non-Leader models cannot spend focus points, be used to channel spells, or be forced.

spells.name: Playing God
spells.description: Target friendly living Faction warbeast is affected by Spontaneous Mutation effects while they affect Absylonia. Additionally, once per turn Absylonia can transfer damage to the affected warbeasts without spending fury.

spells.name: Refuge
spells.description: At the end of an activation in which target friendly Faction model hit an enemy model with an attack, the affected model can make a full advance.

spells.name: Wild Aggression
spells.description: Target friendly living warbeast in the spellcaster's battlegroup can run, charge or make slam or trample power attacks without being forced and gains boosted melee accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Legion of Everblight]
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Infernals army. If it is, it becomes an Infernal model and not a Legion of Everblight model. If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Legion of Everblight Cohort can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless]. Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Legion of Everblight units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Legion of Everblight Solos as well.

characterabilities.name: Ritual Slaughter
characterabilities.description: Once during each of your turns when another friendly Blighted Ogrun model destroys an enemy model with an attack while in this model's Control Range, immediately after the attack is resolved, this model can cast a spell without spending fury. This model can spend fury to boost accuracy and damage rolls on spells cast as a result of Ritual Slaughter.

characterabilities.name: Snacking
characterabilities.description: When this model boxes a living model with a melee attack, it can choose to remove the boxed model from play. When it does, this model can remove d3 damage points.

feat.name: Field of Bones
feat.description: While in Anamag's Control range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Dark Shroud and their melee weapons gain Grievous Wounds. Field of Bones lasts for one turn. (While within 2" of a model with Dark Shroud, enemy models suffer -2 ARM.) (A model hit by a weapon with Grievous Wounds loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.)

execution.name: Scutter [Ogrun] (★Action)
execution.description: RNG 3". Target friendly Ogrun. If the Ogrun is in range, it gains Reposition [3"].

ability.name: Man Catcher
ability.description: A warrior model hit by this attack suffers -2 DEF and cannot advance while within the model's melee range.

spells.name: Bond of Gristle & Bone
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 ARM and Feign Death. (A model with Feign Death cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks while knocked down.).

spells.name: Carnage
spells.description: Friendly Faction models gain +2 to melee attack rolls against enemy models in the spellcaster's Control Range. Carnage lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Fury's Strength
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 to it's melee attack damage rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Gallows
spells.description: When an enemy model is hit by this attack, it can be pushed d6" directly toward Gallows' point of origin.

spells.name: Hex Blast
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

characterabilities.name: Living Nightmare
characterabilities.description: This model is a living model but is neither a warbeast nor a warrior model. It suffers damage like a warbeast but does not suffer the effects of a crippled Spirit aspect. This model can make slam and throw power attacks without spending fury. Effects modifying the amount of damage to or the manner in which damage is applied to a warbeast also apply to it.

characterabilities.name: Spell Driver
characterabilities.description: When this model casts a spell, you can use another model in it's battlegroup and in it's Control Range as the point of origin for the spell. If you do, the model chosen as the point of origin suffers d3+1 damage points after the spell is resolved.

feat.name: Flesh Web
feat.description: Bethayne gains 2 flesh web tokens. Then distribute 2 additional flesh web tokens for each non-lesser warbeast in her battlegroup among one or more living friendly Faction models currently in her Control range. While a model has one or more flesh web tokens it cannot become knocked down or made stationary. A model can transfer to another living friendly model in Bethayne’s Control range as if it had the transferring Damage warlock special rule without spending furry by spending a flesh web token. Flesh Web lasts for one round, when Flesh Web expires remove all flesh web tokens from friendly Faction models.

execution.name: Field Marshal [Reposition [3"]]
execution.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Reposition [3"].

ability.name: Withering Death
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon suffers -2 ARM for one turn unless it has Resistance: Corrosion.

spells.name: Absorb Flesh
spells.description: Remove target friendly living warbeasts from play. Bethayne immediately gains 1 fury point and removes d6+1 damage points from herself. Bethayne also reaves the fury from warbeasts targeted by this spell immediately, but cannot go above her ARC stat in fury points. This spell can only be cast once per round.

spells.name: Breath of Corruption
spells.description: Models hit suffer a POW 12 corrosion damage roll. This spell's AOE is a cloud effect and hazard that remains in play for one round. Models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer 1 point of corrosion damage.

spells.name: Dissolve
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's/unit's melee weapons gain Withering Death. (A model hit by a weapon with Withering Death suffers -2 ARM for one turn unless it has Resistance: Corrosion.

spells.name: Psycho Surgery
spells.description: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range can immediately remove d3+1 damage points. This spell can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Transmutation
spells.description: When Transmutation targets an enemy model/unit, it is an offensive spell and requires a magic attack roll. When Transmutation affects a friendly model/unit, affected models gain +2 STR and DEF and gain pathfinder. When Transmutation affects an enemy model/unit, affected models suffer -2 STR and DEF and lose pathfinder.

products.name: Bethayne, Voice of Everblight and Belphagor

characterabilities.name: Flesh Meld
characterabilities.description:
Bethayne can use Flesh Meld at any time during her activation while B2B with a Belphagor model in her battlegroup. Remove Bethanye from the table. Upkeep spells she cast do not immediately expire, and warbeasts in her battlegroup do not go wild. Any effects on Bethayne when she melds are applied to Belphagor. Remove the fury currently on Belphagor. If there are any fury on Bethayne when she melds, place them on Belphagor. Belphegor cannot activate later in the turn in which it becomes flesh melded.

While melded, Belphagor becomes a warlock warrior model, loses Soulless, takes Control of Bethayne's battlegroup, and can upkeep spells cast by Bethayne. While melded, Belphagor's base CMD becomes 9 and it's base ARC and AAT becomes 7. While melded, Belphagor can cast Bethayne's spells and use her feat. While melded, Belphagor is not considered to be a warbeast and loses it's animus. While melded, Belphagr can make slam and throw power attacks without being forced. While melded, Belphagor suffers damage like a warbeast but does not suffer the effects of crippled aspects. Effects modifying the amount of damage to or the manner in which damage is applied to a warbeast still apply to Belphagor, even while it is melded. If Belphagor is destroyed or removed from play while melded, Bethayne is destroyed.

Bethayne can separate from Belphagor during your Maintenance Phase. When she returns to play, place her B2B with Belphagor. Bethayne returns to play with the same amount of damage she had when she left the table. After Bethayne returns to play, she can upkeep spells cast by Belphagor when they were melded.

feat.name: Arcane Symbiosis
feat.description: While in Bethayne's Control range, friendly models gain boosted magic accuracy and damage rolls. Arcane Symbiosis lasts for one round.

execution.name: Meat for the Beast
execution.description: Once during each of your turns when a model in this model's battlegroup destroys an enemy model with a melee attack while in this model's Control range, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can cast a spell without spending focus.

spells.name: Blood Thorn
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's/unit's ranged and melee weapons gain +2 POW and Continuous Effect Corrosion.

spells.name: Deceleration
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction models gain +2 ARM against ranged and magic attack damage rolls. Deceleration lasts for one round.

spells.name: Disintegration
spells.description: The model hit suffers -2 ARM for one round. A model boxed by Disintegration is removed from play.

spells.name: Hex Blast
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

spells.name: Invocation of Blood
spells.description: If Bethayne is flesh melded with Belphagor when this spell is cast, Belphagor gains +2 SPD, STR, DEF and ARM for one round. Otherwise, Bethayne immediately makes a full advance toward Belphagor. Invocation of Blood can be cast only once per activation.

characterabilities.name: Bond [Bethayne, Voice of Everblight]
characterabilities.description: This model begins the game bonded to Bethayne, Voice of Everblight. This model is not considered to be bonded while under your opponent's control. While this model is in Bethayne's Control Range, she can channel spells through it. Once per turn, when Bethayne channels a spell through this model she can reduce the COST of the spell by 1, to a minimum of 1.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Bethayne, Voice Of Everblight]

If Bethayne, Voice Of Everblight is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Bethayne, Voice Of Everblight's battlegroup.

ability.name: Blood Boon
ability.description: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in which it destroyed an enemy model with this weapon, this model can cast a spell with COST 3 or less without spending focus.

animi.name: Despoiler
animi.description: Center a 5” AOE cloud effect on the spellcaster. The AOE remains centered on the spellcaster for one round. If the spellcaster is destroyed or removed from play, remove the AOE from play. Enemy models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffers 1 damage point.

characterabilities.name: Acrobatics
characterabilities.description: This model can advance through other models if it has enough movement to move completely past their bases. This model ignores intervening models when declaring its charge target.

characterabilities.name: Alternative History
characterabilities.description: This model is not allowed in competitive play events.

characterabilities.name: Dodge

characterabilities.name: Reversal
characterabilities.description: When a model misses this model with a charge or power attack, the attacking model becomes knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Spell Breaker
characterabilities.description: When this model hits another model with an attack, enemy upkeep spells on the model hit expire. A spellcaster can keep that upkeep spell in play by suffering d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Sprint
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it destroyed or removed from play one or more enemy models with melee attacks, this model can immediately make a full advance, then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.description: When an enemy model misses this model with a magic attack, the attacking model becomes the target and is automatically hit by the attack. AOE magic attacks that miss are centered on the attacking model. This model is the point of origin for all these attacks.

characterabilities.name: Witch Hunter
characterabilities.description: When an enemy model declares it is casting a spell while within 10" of this model, this model can immediately make a basic attack targeting the enemy spellcaster. If the spellcaster is destroyed as a result of this damage, the spell does not take effect.

feat.name: Phantom Killer
feat.description: Eiryss can make a basic Soulshadow attack against every enemy model currently in her Control range, ignoring intervening models, using the Phantom Seeker attack type. When resolving Phantom Killer, Eiyrss can target models in her back arc. Eiryss cannot use Phantom Killer while she is in melee. Phantom Killer attacks are simultaneous.

execution.name: Ever Present, Everblight - "Tell me, where is your Maker now? Call him. Call his wrath down upon me. You cannot. For he does not exist…I shall deliver you from this lie in which you linger. Bow before your new god and be spared."

Attacks gained from Snap Fire cannot generate additional attacks from Snap fire.

feat.name: The Reaping
feat.description: When an enemy model is directly hit by a ranged attack made by a friendly Faction model while the friendly Faction model is in Lylyth's Control range, the enemy model becomes stationary for one round. The Reaping lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Leadership [Blighted Nyss Raptors] [Quick Work]
execution.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly faction Blighted Nyss Raptors gain Quick Work.

ability.name: Blood Boon
ability.description: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in which it destroyed an enemy model with this weapon, this model can cast a spell with COST 3 or less without spending focus.

ability.name: Rear Attack
ability.description: When declaring attacks with this weapon, this model can target models in it's back arc.

ability.name: Trampling Hooves
ability.description: This model can make charge attacks with this weapon in addition to making impact attacks.

spells.name: Battle Host
spells.description: Warbeasts in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in it's Control Range gain +2" movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more warbeasts in it's battlegroup are within 3" of it.

spells.name: Frostbite
spells.description: Frostbite causes cold damage. On a critical hit, the model hit becomes stationary for one round unless it has Resistance: Cold.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.description: The spellcaster cannot make ranged attacks after casting this spell, and non-magical ranged attacks targeting it automatically miss. While completely within 3" of the spellcaster, models cannot make ranged attacks and non-magical ranged attacks targeting them automatically miss. Wind Wall lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Archer
characterabilities.description: When making magic attacks, Lylyth may use her RAT instead of her AAT.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Strider Deathstalker] [+1 MAT, +1 RAT, and Stealth]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Strider Deathstalker models gain +1 MAT, +1 RAT, and Stealth.

characterabilities.name: Evasive
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by free strikes. This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy ranged attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing.

characterabilities.name: Range Amplifier
characterabilities.description: When this model casts a spell and is the point of origin for the spell, the spell gains +5 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Soothing Song
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, anytime during your activation phase except while activating a model, this model can spend 1 fury to remove up to 1 fury point from each friendly living Faction warbeast in this model's Control Range.

characterabilities.name: Swift Hunter
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a basic ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can advance up to 2".

feat.name: Decimation
feat.description: While in Lylyth’s Control range, friendly faction Cohort models gain Stealth. Additionally, friendly Faction models gain Gunfighter and can make one additional ranged attack during their activations. Decimation lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Reposition [5"]
execution.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 5", then it's activation ends.

ability.name: Snap Fire
ability.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a ranged attack with this weapon during it's Combat Action, immediately after that attack is resolved this model can make one basic ranged attack with this weapon. Attacks gained from Snap Fire cannot generate additional attacks from Snap fire.

spells.name: Mirage
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Apparition. (During your Control Phase, place models with Apparition anywhere completely within 2" of their current locations.).

spells.name: Pin Cushion
spells.description: Friendly Faction models gain an additional die on ranged accuracy and damage rolls against target model/unit. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

spells.name: Vanish
spells.description: Warp the spellcaster anywhere completely within 3" of its current location. Vanish can be cast only once per activation.

characterabilities.name: Requisition [Khymera]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit can be included in a Khymera army as if it were in that faction.

feat.name: Troubleshoot
feat.description: While in Mekanolyth's Control range, friendly Faction models can reroll ranged accuracy and ranged damage rolls, and their ranged weapons gain +2 RNG. Troubleshoot lasts for one turn.

execution.name: AJM
execution.description: This model gains Gun Platform and Gunfighter. (A model with Gun Platform can make ranged attacks even while in melee and can target models outside of melee.)

topability.name: Arcane Machinery
topability.description: Once per turn at any time during its activation, this model can use one of the following effects. Arcane Machinery effects last for one round.

subabilities.name: Arcane Reconfiguration
subabilities.description: Change the COST of each spell on this model's card to 2.

subabilities.name: Kinetic Invigoration
subabilities.description: Warbeasts in this model's battlegroup gain Run & Gun. (At the end of it's activation, if it destroyed one or more enemy models with ranged attacks that activation, a model with Run & Gun can make a full advance.)

subabilities.name: Target Lock
subabilities.description: Enemy models cannot use Shield Guard when this model makes a ranged attack. Additionally, this mode gains boosted ranged accuracy rolls.

spells.name: Broadside
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range can immediately make one basic ranged attack. Broadside can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Deflection
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction models gain +2 DEF against ranged and magic attacks. Deflection lasts for one round.

spells.name: Hellish Volley
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes one basic attack with one of its ranged weapons against each enemy model in its LOS that is within 3" of it. This model can make these attacks even while in melee. These attacks are simultaneous and ignore the target in melee DEF bonus.

spells.name: Jumpstart
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup that are currently in its Control Range stand up and are no longer stationary. Affected models can turn to face any direction. Models that were knocked down this turn are not affected by Jumpstart.

spells.name: Mortality
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2DEF and ARM, loses Tough, and cannot have damage removed from it. Mortality lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Acrobatics
characterabilities.description: This model can advance through other models if it has enough movement to move completely past their bases. This model ignores intervening models when declaring its charge target.

characterabilities.name: Channeler [Saeryn]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in a Friendly Leader's Control Range, the Friendly Leader model can channel spells through it.

characterabilities.name: Riposte
characterabilities.description: When this model is missed by an enemy melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one basic melee attack against the attacking model.

characterabilities.name: Sprint
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it destroyed or removed from play one or more enemy models with melee attacks, this model can immediately make a full advance, then it's activation ends.

feat.name: Tide of Blood
feat.description: Rhyas and friendly Faction models activating in her Control range gain one additional melee attack during their Combat Actions. The first time a friendly Faction model damages an enemy model with a basic melee attack during it's Combat Action while in Rhyas' Control range, immediately place the attacking model anywhere B2B with the damaged model. Tide of Blood lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Parry
execution.description: Once per round during your opponent's turn, when an enemy model within this model's LOS targets it with a melee attack, this model can make a melee attack against the enemy model before it makes it's attack accuracy roll. If this model's melee attack hits, the enemy model suffers no damage but it's attack automatically misses.

ability.name: Critical Decapitation
ability.description: On a critical hit, double the damage exceeding the ARM of the model hit. A model disabled by this attack cannot make a Tough roll.

ability.name: Spirit Eater
ability.description: This model can reave fury from enemy warbeasts destroyed by this weapon. Other models cannot reave fury from enemy warbeasts destroyed by this weapon.

spells.name: Dash
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction warrior models activating in its Control Range gain +1 SPD. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Unstoppable. Dash lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Occultation
spells.description: Target friendly Faction Model/Unit gains Stealth. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Rapport
spells.description: Target warbeast in the spellcaster's battlegroup can use the spellcaster's current MAT and RAT in place of its own. When checking to see if the affected warbeast is in its controller's Control Range, double the range.

characterabilities.name: Channeler [Rhyas]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in a Friendly Leader's Control Range, the Friendly Leader model can channel spells through it.

characterabilities.name: Identical Twins
characterabilities.description: Saeryn and Rhyas are both warlock models. Saeryn and Rhyas share a single battlegroup and count as one warlock for the purposes of army construction. Rhyas is attached to Saeryn and cannot have an attachment. Your warlock is destroyed only if both Saeryn and Rhyas are destroyed or removed from play. If Rhyas advances or is warped outside of Saeryn's Control range at any time during her activation, her activation immediately ends. If Rhyas activates and is outside of Saeryn's Control range, she must immediately use her movement action to move back into Saeryn's Control range, if her movement would be insufficient to get back into Saeryn's Control range, she must run to move back into Saeryn's Control range.

characterabilities.name: Set Defense
characterabilities.description: A model in this model's front arc suffers -2 on charge, slam power attack, and impact attack accuracy rolls against this model.

feat.name: Conjoined Spirits
feat.description: Conjoined Spirits can be used once per game by either Saeryn or Rhyas. When it is used, you can either have Saeryn and Rhyas immediately trade places or you can return one of them to play. You can choose to return Saeryn or Rhyas to play even if they were removed from play. Place the returned model completely within 3" of the model that used Conjoined Spirits. The returned model comes into play with a number of fury points equal to it's ARC. After Conjoined Spirits is used, Saeryn and Rhyas cannot advance for the rest of the turn. If either Seryn or Rhyas is damaged by an attack made by the other, they both lose Conjoined Spirits for the rest of the game.

execution.name: Gang
execution.description: When making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in the melee range of another model in this model's battlegroup, this model gains +2 to melee attack accuracy and melee damage rolls.

ability.name: Dispel
ability.description: When this weapon hits a model/unit, upkeep spells and animi on that model/unit immediately expire.

spells.name: Banishing Ward
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on target friendly model/unit expire. Affected models cannot be targeted by enemy spells or animi.

spells.name: Blood Rain
spells.description: Blood Rain causes corrosion damage. Models hit suffer the Corrosion continuous effect.

spells.name: Fury
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +3 to melee damage rolls but suffers -1 DEF.

spells.name: Marked For Death

spells.name: Psychic Vampire

If the enemy spellcaster is destroyed as a result of this damage, the spell does not take effect.

characterabilities.description: While this model is in a Friendly Leader's Control Range, the Friendly Leader model can channel spells through it.

If Saeryn, Talon Of Everblight is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Saeryn, Talon Of Everblight's battlegroup.

If Rhyas activates and is outside of Saeryn's Control Range, she must immediately use her movement action to move back into Saeryn's Control Range, if her movement would be insufficient to get back into Saeryn's Control Range, she must run to move back into Saeryn's Control Range.

characterabilities.description: While this model is in a Friendly Leader's Control Range, the Friendly Leader model can channel spells through it.

characterabilities.name: Force Barrier

feat.name: Foreboding
feat.description: While in Saeryn's Control range, friendly Faction models gain +3 ARM and models in her battlegroup gain Retaliatory Strike. Foreboding lasts for one round. (If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by an enemy melee attack during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved it can immediately make one basic melee attack against the attacking model. A model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.)

execution.name: Anatomical Precision
execution.description: When this model's melee damage roll fails to exceed the ARM of a living model hit, that model suffers 1 damage point. A model disabled by a melee attack made by this model cannot make a Tough Roll.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

ability.name: Poison
ability.description: Gain an additional die on this weapon's damage rolls against living models.

spells.name: Blight Bringer

spells.name: Breath Stealer
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 SPD and DEF for one round.

spells.name: Hellfire
spells.description: Models disabled by Hellfire cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by Hellfire are removed from play.

spells.name: Respawn
spells.description: When target large-base or smaller warbeast in the spellcaster's battlegroup is disabled by an enemy attack at any time except while advancing, place it anywhere completely within 3" of its current location. Remove 1 damage point from each aspect, then respawn expires.

characterabilities.name: Athanc
characterabilities.description: Immediately after leeching, this model gains up to its ARC in fury. It cannot exceed its ARC in fury as a result of Athanc.

characterabilities.name: Death Shroud
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, enemy models suffer -2 STR.

feat.description: Return one destroyed large-based or smaller warbeast that was part of Thagrosh's battlegroup to play. Place it anywhere completely within 3”of him. The warbeast cannot charge, make slam power attacks, or be forced except to cast it's animus this turn.

execution.name: Great Power
execution.description: During your Control Phase, this model can upkeep one spell without spending focus, fury or essence.

ability.name: Eruption of Ash
ability.description: If a model is boxed by an attack made with this weapon, center a 3" AOE cloud effect on the boxed model and then remove that model from play. The AOE is a hazard that remains in play for one round. Enemy models in the AOE when it was put in play are hit and suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Enemy models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Eruption of Ash damage rolls cannot be boosted.

spells.name: Draconic Blessing
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 STR and Resistance: Fire. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Fog of War
spells.description: Models gain concealment while in the spellcaster's Control Range.

spells.name: Mutagenesis
spells.description: Target model boxed by Mutagenesis is removed from play. When Mutagenesis boxes an enemy model and the spellcaster was the spell's point of origin, the spellcaster can replace the boxed model when it is removed from play. The spellcaster cannot advance this activation after replacing another model as a result of Mutagenesis. Mutagenesis can only be cast once per activation.

spells.name: Obliteration
spells.description: The force of this attack blasts apart the earth itself.

spells.name: Twisted Form
spells.description: Target warbeast suffers -2 Fury, cannot have damage removed from it, and cannot have damage transferred to it. Twisted Form lasts for one round. Twisted Form can be cast only once per activation.

The warbeast is part of this model's battlegroup. The warbeast cannot activate this turn.

characterabilities.name: Sacrificial Pawn [Lesser Warbeast]
characterabilities.description: When this model is directly hit by an enemy ranged attack, you can have one friendly, non-incorporeal Lesser Warbeast model within 3" of it directly hit instead. That model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. The Sacrificial Pawn special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

feat.name: Dragon Storm
feat.description: After all friendly models have completed their activations this turn, each warbeast in Thagrosh's battlegroup that is in his Control range can make a full advance followed by one basic melee attack. Completely resolve each warbeast's movement and attack before moving on to the next.

execution.name: Hyper-Regeneration

characterabilities.name: Condition (★Action)

characterabilities.name: Cower
characterabilities.description: While within 3” of a friendly Faction warbeast this model gains Resistance: Blast.

characterabilities.name: Medicate [d3] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1”. Target friendly living warbeast. If the warbeast is in range, remove d3+1 damage points from it.

characterabilities.name: Aerial Coordination
characterabilities.description: Friendly Faction warbeasts with Flight beginning their activations in this model's command range can charge without being forced.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [5"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 5", then it's activation ends.

topability.name: Magic Ability
topability.description: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

subabilities.name: Blight Storm
subabilities.description: Place a 5” cloud effect AOE anywhere completely within this model's command range. When an enemy model in the AOE is directly hit by an attack and the damage roll fails to exceed its Arm, that model suffers 1 damage point. Blight Storm lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Deathly Power
subabilities.description: This model gains Dark Shroud for one turn.

subabilities.name: Wind Ravager
subabilities.description: While in this model's command range, enemy models cannot make ranged attacks. Wind Ravager lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Backdraft
characterabilities.description: When this model hits an enemy model with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can make one additional melee attack against the same enemy model. This model can gain only one additional attack from Backdraft each activation.

characterabilities.name: Blade Shield
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 DEF against ranged attack accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.name: Cleave
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can make one additional melee attack. This model can make only one additional attack as a result of Cleave each activation.

characterabilities.name: Leadership [Blighted Nyss Swordsmen] [True Strike]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly faction Blighted Nyss Swordsmen gain True Strike.

characterabilities.name: Overtake
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, after the attack is resolved it can immediately advance up to 1".

characterabilities.name: True Strike
characterabilities.description: When this model damages a warjack or warbeast with a melee attack, choose which column or branch suffers the damage.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Sacrificial Pawn [Blighted Nyss Archers]
characterabilities.description: When this model is directly hit by an enemy ranged attack, you can have one friendly, non-incorporeal Blighted Nyss Archers model within 3" of it directly hit instead. That model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. The Sacrificial Pawn special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Swift Hunter
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a basic ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can advance up to 2".

ability.name: Arcing Fire
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Blight Spasm
subabilities.description: When this model boxes an enemy model with this weapon, enemy models within 1” of the boxed model suffer a damage roll with a POW equal to the boxed model's STR. These additional damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Blight Spasm damage rolls are simultaneous.

subabilities.name: Poison
subabilities.description: Gain an additional die on this weapon's damage rolls against living models.

subabilities.name: Weaken
subabilities.description: A living model hit by this weapon suffers -2 STR and DEF for one round.

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

characterabilities.name: Prowl
characterabilities.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

characterabilities.name: Rapid Strike
characterabilities.description: This model can make one additional melee attack each Combat Action.

ability.name: Chain Strike
ability.description: This weapon becomes RNG 4 during this model's activation.

topability.name: Attack Type

subabilities.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

subabilities.name: Inflict Pain
subabilities.description: When this weapon hits a warbeast, this model can place 1 fury point on or remove 1 fury point from the hit warbeast.

subabilities.description: On a hit against a model with an equal or smaller base, the model hit can be thrown d6" directly away from this model. The model thrown does not deviate. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the POW of this weapon.

characterabilities.name: Leadership [Grotesques] [Stealth]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly faction Grotesques gain Stealth.

characterabilities.name: Sprint

characterabilities.name: Veteran Leader [Grotesques]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, Grotesques models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

characterabilities.name: Host
characterabilities.description: Incubus models do not begin the game in play. When a friendly living non-Incubus, Non-Leader, small-based Faction warrior model is destroyed by an enemy attack, collateral damage, or a continuous effect, you can replace it with an Incubus model that has not been put into play.

ability.name: Combo Strike (★Attack)

characterabilities.name: Swift Hunter
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a basic ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can advance up to 2".

characterabilities.name: Arcane Assist

characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it. The attached model is part of its Leader's Battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

topability.name: Magic Ability
topability.description: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

subabilities.name: Hex Bolt (★Attack)
subabilities.description: Hex Bolt is a RNG 6, POW 13 magic attack. Models hit cannot make special actions, special attacks, or power attacks for one round.

subabilities.name: Influence (★Attack)
subabilities.description: Influence is a RNG 10” magic attack. Take Control of the target enemy non-Leader warrior model hit. The model immediately makes one basic attack, then Influence expires. A model can be affected by Influence only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Athanc
characterabilities.description: Immediately after leeching, this model gains up to its ARC in fury. It cannot exceed its ARC in fury as a result of Athanc.

characterabilities.name: Lesser Warlock
characterabilities.description: This model is not a warlock but has the following special rules: Battlegroup Commander, Fury Manipulation, Healing, Spellcaster, and Transferring Damage. This model must have at least one warbeast in its battlegroup at the start of the game.

topability.name: Metamorphosis
topability.description: At the beginning of this model's activation, it can spend 1 fury point to gain one of the following Metamorphosis abilities. Each subsequent ability adds 1 additional fury point to this cost. It can gain each rule once per game.

subabilities.name: Defiant Rage
subabilities.description: When this model is damaged by an enemy attack, after the attack is resolved this model gains +2 STR and ARM for one round.

subabilities.name: Draconic Mastery
subabilities.description: Once per activation, this model can cast the animus of a friendly Faction warbeast in its Control range without spending fury.

subabilities.name: Ethrunbal's Guidance
subabilities.description: While in this model's Control range, models in its battlegroup can reroll missed accuracy rolls. Each accuracy roll can be rerolled only once as a result of Ethrunbal's Guidance.

spells.name: Blight Burst
spells.description: The AOE remains in play for one round. While in the AOE, enemy non-Leader models cannot spend focus points, be used to channel spells, or be forced.

spells.name: Mutagenesis
spells.description: Target model boxed by Mutagenesis is removed from play. When Mutagenesis boxes an enemy model and the spellcaster was the spell's point of origin, the spellcaster can replace the boxed model when it is removed from play. The spellcaster cannot advance this activation after replacing another model as a result of Mutagenesis. Mutagenesis can only be cast once per activation.

characterabilities.name: Ferocious
characterabilities.description: During its activation, this model can spend fury points to make additional attacks or to boost accuracy or damage rolls. It can make one additional attack or boost one roll for each fury point spent.

characterabilities.name: Resolute Rage
characterabilities.description: This model has +1 ARM for each fury point on it.

topability.name: Magic Ability

subabilities.name: Consume Fury
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Faction warbeast. If the warbeast is in range, remove up to 5 fury points from it and place them on this model. This model can have up to 5 fury points at any time.

characterabilities.name: Blight Cloud
characterabilities.description: This model can use Blight Cloud once per activation at any time. Center a 3” AOE cloud effect on this model. The AOE remains centered on this model for one round. If this model is destroyed or removed from play, remove the AOE from play. Models in the AOE when it is placed or that enter or end their activation in the AOE suffer the Continuous Corrosion effect.

ability.name: Scather

characterabilities.description: This order can be issued only if two or more models with ranged weapons in this unit in formation are able to forfeit their Combat Actions. Each model in this unit in formation must forfeit its action. Place an AOE completely within the weapon RNG of all participants, with its center point in LOS of all participants, ignoring intervening models. The size of the AOE is based on the number of participants. If there are 2-4, the AOE is 3". If there are 5-7, the AOE is 4". If there are 8 or more, the AOE is 5". When a model enters or ends its activation within the AOE, it suffers a POW 10 damage roll. Suppressing Fire lasts for one round or until all participants have been destroyed or removed from play.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

ability.name: Lightning Generator
ability.description: When a model is directly hit with a basic attack made with this weapon, lightning arcs from the model hit to d3 consecutive additional models unless that model has Resistance: Electric. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 4" of the last model it arced to ignoring this model and models with Resistance: Electric. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that cause the lighting to arc.

spells.name: Inhospitable Ground

spells.name: Jackhammer

spells.name: Mobility

spells.name: Sunhammer

subabilities.name: Arcane Interference

spells.name: Fury

This AOE does not block friendly Faction models' LOS while in the AOE friendly Faction models gain Pathfinder and can move through obstructions and other models if they have enough movement to move completely past them.

characterabilities.description: Take Control of a living enemy non-leader model. If the model is in range you can immediately make a full advance with the enemy model followed by a basic melee attack, then Seduction expires. The enemy model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement. A model can be affected by Seduction only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Sucker!
characterabilities.description: If this model is directly hit by an enemy ranged attack, choose a friendly non-incorporeal warrior model within 3" of it to be directly hit instead. That model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Crucible Guard, Cryx, Cygnar, Ios, Llael, Ord, Protectorate of Menoth, Searforge Commission, Thornfall Alliance]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Crucible Guard, Cryx, Cygnar, Ios, Llael, Ord, Protectorate of Menoth, Searforge Commission, Thornfall Alliance.

characterabilities.name: Granted [Rise]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Rise.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Religion of the Twins]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Religion of the Twins.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Cygnar]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Cygnar army, this model is a Cygnar model instead of a Mercenary model.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Religion of the Twins]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Religion of the Twins army, this model is a Religion of the Twins model instead of a Mercenary model.

characterabilities.name: Sacred Ward
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

characterabilities.name: Shield Guard
characterabilities.description: When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have this model directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

characterabilities.name: Spell Breaker
characterabilities.description: When this model hits another model with an attack, enemy upkeep spells on the model hit expire. A spellcaster can keep that upkeep spell in play by suffering d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Weapon Attachment [Small or Medium-based Unit]
characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Small or Medium-based Unit unit.

characterabilities.name: Command Attachment [Precursor Knights]
characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Precursor Knights unit.

characterabilities.name: Faithful
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in Religion of the Twins armies and is counted as a Religion of the Twins model. When included in a Religion of the Twins army this model is a Religion of the Twins model in addition to its faction identity.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Cygnar, Religion of the Twins]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Cygnar, Religion of the Twins.

characterabilities.name: Morrow's Name
characterabilities.description: This model can use Morrow's Name once per game at any time during it's activation. This activation, models in this unit gain an additional die on melee damage rolls.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Cygnar]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Cygnar army, this model is a Cygnar model instead of a Mercenary model.

characterabilities.name: Sacred Ward
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

characterabilities.name: Tactics [Last Rites]
characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Last Rites.

characterabilities.name: Granted [Inspiration]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Inspiration.

characterabilities.name: Heal [D3] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1". Target friendly living Faction model. If the model is in range remove D3 damage points from it.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Cygnar, Religion of the Twins]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Cygnar, Religion of the Twins.

characterabilities.name: Take Up
characterabilities.description: If this model is destroyed, you can choose a trooper in this unit within 1” of it to be destroyed instead. Remove that trooper from the table instead of this model. This model has the same number of unmarked damage boxes as the chosen trooper.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it. The attached model is part of its Leader's Battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Searforge Commission, Talion Charter, Thornfall Alliance]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Blindwater Congregation, Cephalyx, Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Searforge Commission, Talion Charter, Thornfall Alliance.

topability.name: Leader Benefits
topability.description: While its Leader is in this model's command range, this model can use one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Lucky Charm (★Action)
subabilities.description: During its activation this turn, this model's warcaster can reroll one attack or damage roll, then Lucky Charm expires.

subabilities.name: Reloader (★Action)
subabilities.description: During its Combat Action this turn, this model's warcaster can make one additional ranged attack.

subabilities.name: Spyglass (★Action)
subabilities.description: Target an enemy model in this model's LOS. That model loses stealth for one round.

characterabilities.name: Command Attachment [Horgenhold Forge Guard]
characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Horgenhold Forge Guard unit.

characterabilities.name: Granted [Cleave]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Cleave.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Cygnar, Crucible Guard, Ord. Llael. Protectorate or Searforge Commission]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Cygnar, Crucible Guard, Ord. Llael. Protectorate or Searforge Commission.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Seaforge Commission]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Seaforge Commission army, this model is a Seaforge Commission model instead of a Mercenary model.

characterabilities.name: Reinforcements [Rhulic]
characterabilities.description: During your Maintenance Phase, return d3 small or medium based friendly destroyed Rhulic Grunts to play. Models return with 1 unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunts completely within this model's CMD range, in formation and completely within 3” of another model in their unit. Returned Grunts must forfeit their combat actions the turn they are returned to play.

characterabilities.name: Wall of Steel
characterabilities.description: While this model is B2B with one or more models in its unit, it gains +2 ARM.

topability.name: Battle Plan
topability.description: This model can use one of the following plans at any time during its activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.

subabilities.name: Combat Coordination
subabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model. If the target model is in range, during its activation this turn, it can reroll one accuracy or damage roll, then Combat Coordination expires.

subabilities.name: Desperate Pace [Forge Guard] (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Forge Guard unit. If the unit is in range, Forge Guard models in that unit gain +2" movement during their Normal Movement this turn.

subabilities.name: Reveille
subabilities.description: Knocked down friendly Faction models in this model's CMD range immediately stand up. Models that became knocked down this turn are not affected by Reveille.

ability.name: Combo Smite (★Attack)
ability.description: The model hit is slammed d6" directly away from this model. If the model hit has a larger base than the attacking model, it is moved only half the distance rolled. When resolving damage for this attack, the model hit suffers a damage roll with POW equal to the STR of this model plus twice the POW of this weapon. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the STR of this model.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Assist
characterabilities.description: If its leader is in this model's CMD range during your Control Phase, the leader can upkeep one spell without spending focus/fury/essence.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Secrets (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target this model's warcaster. If the warcaster is in range, it gains an additional die on magic attack rolls and magic damage rolls for the next spell it casts. Discard the lowest die in each roll. Arcane Secrets lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it. The attached model is part of its Leader's Battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Ios, Khador, Llael, Ord, Protectorate of Menoth, Searforge Commission]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Ios, Khador, Llael, Ord, Protectorate of Menoth, Searforge Commission.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Ios]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Ios army, this model is a Ios model instead of a Mercenary model.

characterabilities.name: Spiritual Conduit
characterabilities.description: While its Leader is in this model's command range, when the Leader casts a spell and is the point of origin for the spell, the spell gains +2 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Bulldoze
characterabilities.description: When this model is B2B with an enemy model during it's Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

characterabilities.name: Girded
characterabilities.description: This model and models B2B with it gain Resistance: Blast.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Searforge Commission]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Searforge Commission army, this model is a Searforge Commission model instead of a Mercenary model.

characterabilities.name: Periscope
characterabilities.description: This model can use Periscope once per activation at any time. Choose an enemy model in this model's Line of Sight. That model loses Stealth for one round.

characterabilities.name: Reinforcements [Rhulic]
characterabilities.description: During your Maintenance Phase, return d3 small or medium based friendly destroyed Rhulic Grunts to play. Models return with 1 unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunts completely within this model's CMD range, in formation and completely within 3” of another model in their unit. Returned Grunts must forfeit their combat actions the turn they are returned to play.

characterabilities.name: Roadblock
characterabilities.description: This model provides cover to friendly models as if it were an obstacle. This model loses Roadblock while it is incorporeal or knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Searforge Commission]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Searforge Commission.

ability.name: Critical Stagger
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit loses its inital attacks and cannot make power attacks or special attacks for one round.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

characterabilities.name: Evasive
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by free strikes. This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy ranged attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing.

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Gun Platform
characterabilities.description: This model can make ranged attacks even while in melee and can target models outside of melee.

characterabilities.name: Propelled [12]
characterabilities.description: This model cannot run, aim, charge, or become knocked down. This model can advance up to 12” total during its Normal Movement. If this model advances less than 12” during its Normal Movement, it can advance its remaining movement at the end of its activation.

characterabilities.name: Shooting Gallery
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 to Ranged accuracy rolls against models within 5” of it.

ability.name: Crater
ability.description: On a direct hit, models hit suffer -2 SPD for one round.

ability.name: Critical Devastation
ability.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Move models farthest from the attacker first. characterabilities.name: Bottom Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any army]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any army.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.
